name: Mastodon Canyon
description:
Introduction

This is the direct, recommended approach to Moonflower and Sunseed. See eponymous petroglyphs at 38.54912, -109.58906 before heading up the canyon. Once at the top, veer east and north to the head of Moonflower. Veer right (south) to Sunseed.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
